chunk:
Rocky Mountain Soap Co. Hydrating Toner, Aloe & Frankincense (2019 formulation)

Brand: Rocky Mountain Soap Co.

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua (Distilled Water), Fagus Sylvatica (Beech Tree) Bud Extract, Honey Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Cymbopogon Martinii Var Motia (Palmarosa) Oil, Boswellia Carterii (Frankincen

Carterii (Frankincense) Oil, Pelargonium Roseum (Geranium) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Var Amara (Neroli) Oil

Directions: Shake well to blend the oils. Mist face and decollete after cleansing. Reapply throughout the day for added refreshment and enjoyment of a calming and uplifting

alming and uplifting aromatherapy experience.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
